title: A proclamacion for the marchaunts aduenturers
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: By Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cavvood, Printers to the Quenes maiestie,
notes: Prohibiting unlicensed export of gold and silver.
"Teste me ipsa apud VVestminster primo die Maij Anno Regni nostri primo."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
